name: Blink Dog
description: The Blink Dog is a canine creature with sleek fur, bright intelligent eyes, and a notable ability to teleport short distances.
memorable: Its ability to blink in and out of existence makes it an unpredictable and agile opponent.
goals: To protect its pack and territory, and to hunt for food.
relations: Often found in packs and may interact with other fey creatures.
strengths: Exceptional Dexterity and the ability to teleport, which enhances its survivability and maneuverability in combat.
weaknesses: Relatively low Armor Class and hit points make it susceptible to damage.
attacks: Primarily uses a bite attack for melee damage.
most_powerful_ability: Teleportation allows for rapid repositioning in battles, adding an exceptional level of mobility.
senses: Has Keen Hearing and Smell, providing advantage on Perception checks that rely on these senses.
skills: Excels in Stealth and Perception checks, allowing it to detect threats and remain hidden.
additional_information: Resistant to the charmed and unconscious conditions.
Has advantage on attack rolls if an ally is within 5 feet (Pack Tactics).
Can teleport up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
Often used as a scout and protective companion.
Holds a long-standing hatred for displacer beasts.
